sunny_batra05: After treatment of chemo and or radiation it is true that it takes years until you feel alive... with the side effects of chemo and radiation you will never be 100 % because your immune system is weak 😩 At that most difficult moment you know who your real friends are or people who appreciate you. 🤗 🤗 Unfortunately, FB friends, like most friendships or family, will leave in the middle of a story. They want to do a "like" for history, but they don't really read the message when they see it's long. More than half have stopped reading. Someone may have already gone to the next post in the news feed. I decided to publish this post to support the families of friends and relatives who fought this terrible disease to the end... Now I focus on those who take time to read this post to the end... A little test if you want just to see who reads, and who shares it without reading. Cancer is a very aggressive and destructive enemy of our body. Even after discontinuation of the treatment, the body is broken even in trying to restore the damage caused by the treatment, to combat the disease. It's a very long process. Please, in honor of a ❤ family ❤ or a friend who died of cancer, or continues to fight cancer, or even has cancer; copy and paste this post as a post on your fb page. How many times have we heard the others say : "If you need anything, don't hesitate to call me, I will be there to help you" !! I bet most people who saw this post (Maybe even read it to the end) will publish it, to show your support for a family / friend. ❤️ Copy and paste - but don't share this post. I'd like to know who I can count on when I take a minute of your time to really read this...When you're done with it, write "done" in the comment .❤❤❤
